# View sync results via System Health Dashboard

Learn how to view sync results using the System Health Dashboard in Zuora.

1.  Navigate to in the left navigation menu.
2.  Within the System Health section, click Zuora Connector for Salesforce CRM .
3.  Under the Overview tab, you can find the number of object sync requests sent within a specified time range and details of each request, including successful and failed sync.

    ![](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/3e2d8bfa-790a-4b66-8359-72c1e8a4869d?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..a0sU5D0clYiq_rrlvjCe1EismkERv9GW364bABdZpRA)
